archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0881
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able to create alerts and reports from network , mediated, rated and billed datasets so that we can monitor for high usage and fraudulent behaviour and track any past or present revenue related issues

properties.value: Reted CDRs feed from Comarch is needed DX: Note require hourly

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
